verbs.description: [ARG0: i] [V: took] [ARG1: a rare look inside one of amazon giant warehouses] [ARGM-TMP: right before the company hiked workers wages] amazon fulfillment center in kent washington is about 20 miles south of amazon seattle headquarters the fulfillment center is just under 1 million square feet and it contains 18 miles of conveyor belts and lots of robots kent fulfillment center amazon amazoncom
